layout.title: Online Booking System | 24/7 Appointment Scheduling
layout.description: Complete online booking system for spas and massage businesses. Let customers book appointments 24/7, reduce no-shows, and free up your staff from phone calls.

hero.title: Let Customers Book Anytime, Anywhere
hero.text: Give your customers the freedom to book appointments 24/7 from any device. Our online booking system works while you sleep, reduces no-shows with automatic reminders, and frees your staff from endless phone calls.
hero.imageAlt: Woman booking spa appointment on mobile phone

services.title: Stop Losing Bookings to Phone Tag
services.text: How many potential customers have you lost because they called after hours? Or gave up when your line was busy? Online booking means you never miss another opportunity, and your customers get instant confirmation.

items.title: Book 24/7, Even When You're Closed
items.text: Customers can book appointments at 11pm on a Sunday or 6am on Monday morning. Your calendar fills up automatically while you focus on providing great treatments.

items.title: Automatic Reminders Reduce No-Shows
items.text: SMS and email reminders sent automatically before appointments. Customers can confirm or reschedule with one click. Reduce no-shows by up to 80%.

items.title: Free Your Staff from Phone Calls
items.text: Stop interrupting treatments to answer booking calls. Your team can focus on the customers in front of them while new bookings come in automatically online.

reviews.title: How Online Booking Transformed These Businesses

items.text: We were losing so many bookings because we couldn't answer the phone during treatments. Now we get bookings 24/7 and our no-show rate dropped from 25% to less than 5%. It's paid for itself ten times over.
items.name: Lisa Anderson
items.title: Owner, Tranquil Touch Spa

items.text: Our customers love the convenience of booking online. We've seen a 35% increase in bookings since launching, and my staff are so much happier not being tied to the phone all day. Best decision we ever made.
items.name: Michael Brown
items.title: Manager, Thai Harmony Wellness

features.title: Everything You Need for Seamless Booking
features.text: Our booking system isn't just a calendar - it's a complete appointment management solution that makes your life easier and your customers happier.

items.title: Real-Time Availability
items.text: Customers see your actual availability in real-time. No double bookings, no confusion. What they see is what they get.

items.title: Mobile-Friendly Booking
items.text: Over 80% of bookings happen on mobile. Our system is designed mobile-first, making it effortless for customers to book on any device.

items.title: Automatic Confirmations & Reminders
items.text: Instant booking confirmations via email and SMS. Automatic reminders 24 hours before appointments. Customers can confirm or reschedule with one click.

items.title: Multiple Therapists & Services
items.text: Manage multiple team members, treatment rooms, and services. Customers can choose their preferred therapist or let you assign automatically.

items.title: Cancellation & Rescheduling
items.text: Customers can cancel or reschedule online within your policy rules. Cancelled slots automatically become available for other customers.

items.title: Integrated with Your Website
items.text: Seamlessly embedded in your website design. Customers never leave your site to book - it's all branded and professional.
